concept.title: TestProject migration
concept.shortdesc: This article demonstrates how helps users migrate their TestProject project to Katalon Studio. The article also contains some of the test cases for Web, Mobile and API test migration.

conbody.p: TestProject is an end-to-end automation tool that provides capabilities to automate Web, API, and Mobile applications. It is an open-source friendly tool built on top of Selenium and Appium. TestProject employs OpenSDK with Junit 5 for building and execution of test cases.
